articles.description: That most iconic of grille designs, through the ages. Is the new 4 Series snout a fitting tribute to the designs of early BMWs?
articles.content: Long a signature of the BMW brand, the 'kidney' grille has evolved over the years, starting life on the BMW 303 (below), the first car to sport what is technically called a bifurcated grille.
